newsitem.title: USA: Asyst to acquire Radiance Systems Inc.
newsitem.headline: Asyst to acquire Radiance Systems Inc.

text.p: Asyst Technologies Inc said Tuesday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire Radiance Systems Inc.
Radiance is a private company based in Santa Clara, Calif., that specializes in software for the semiconductor and electronics industries.
Asyst said it expects the stock-for-stock deal to close within about 30 days, following approval by the California Department of Corporations. Financial details were not disclosed.

Asyst said it will retain all Radiance employees, bringing its total staff to over 60. Staffing is expected to increase significantly in the next 12 to 24 months as Radiance operations ramp up, it said.
